member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Configuration.Design.TypeBuildNode
member.summary: Represents a type in the data structure used by the to specify types.
member.remarks:
A node holds a , and if the type is an open generic type the node will have children representing the generic type parameters.
A node can be asked to create the type it represents. Doing so might throw exceptions if the represented type is not valid (e.g. if the types assigned to the child nodes of a node representing a generic type do not satisfy the parameter constraints); the node doesn't attempt to validate whether the specified type can be built, letting the .NET framework perform the necessary validations.
